name: Naruto
author: Masashi Kishimoto
description: Naruto Uzumaki, a young ninja with a sealed demon fox inside him, embarks on a journey to become the strongest ninja and gain the recognition of his village.

name: One Piece
author: Eiichiro Oda
description: Monkey D. Luffy sets out on an epic adventure to find the legendary One Piece treasure and become the Pirate King, facing numerous challenges with his crew.

name: Attack on Titan
author: Hajime Isayama
description: In a world besieged by gigantic humanoid Titans, Eren Yeager and his friends join the military to fight for humanity's survival and uncover the secrets behind the Titans.

name: My Hero Academia
author: Kohei Horikoshi
description: Izuku Midoriya, a boy born without superpowers in a world where they are common, dreams of becoming a hero. He enrolls in U.A. High School to make his dream a reality.

name: Dragon Ball
author: Akira Toriyama
description: Follow the adventures of Goku as he trains in martial arts and explores the world in search of the seven Dragon Balls, which can summon a wish-granting dragon.

name: Death Note
author: Tsugumi Ohba
description: Light Yagami discovers a mysterious notebook that grants the power to kill anyone whose name is written in it. He decides to use it to rid the world of criminals.

name: Fullmetal Alchemist
author: Hiromu Arakawa
description: Brothers Edward and Alphonse Elric use alchemy in their quest to find the Philosopher's Stone to restore their bodies after a failed alchemical experiment.

name: Sword Art Online
author: Reki Kawahara
description: Players of a virtual reality MMORPG find themselves trapped in the game, where dying in the game means dying in real life. Kirito fights to survive and escape.

name: Demon Slayer
author: Koyoharu Gotouge
description: Tanjiro Kamado becomes a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister, Nezuko, who has been turned into a demon. Together, they battle demons across Japan.

name: Tokyo Ghoul
author: Sui Ishida
description: Ken Kaneki, a college student, survives a deadly encounter with a ghoul, only to become half-ghoul himself. He must adapt to his new life while hiding his identity.

name: Bleach
author: Tite Kubo
description: Ichigo Kurosaki gains the abilities of a Soul Reaper and battles malevolent spirits known as Hollows while protecting the living and guiding souls to the afterlife.

name: Fairy Tail
author: Hiro Mashima
description: Lucy Heartfilia joins the Fairy Tail guild and teams up with Natsu Dragneel, a fire-breathing dragon slayer, on thrilling quests and battles against dark forces.

name: Black Clover
author: YÅ«ki Tabata
description: Asta, a boy born without magic in a magical world, dreams of becoming the Wizard King. He joins the Black Bulls squad and faces numerous magical challenges.

name: One Punch Man
author: ONE
description: Saitama, a hero who can defeat any opponent with a single punch, struggles with boredom and a lack of worthy challenges in a world filled with monsters and villains.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
author: Hirohiko Araki
description: The Joestar family fights evil supernatural forces across generations, each member wielding unique powers and encountering bizarre, thrilling adventures.
